# standarflow - Investor-Founder Platform Project

## Project Overview
Modern investor-founder matching platform built with Next.js and TypeScript.

## Setup Progress
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Scaffold Next.js project
- [x] Customize for platform features
- [x] Install dependencies
- [x] Run development server
- [x] Finalize documentation

## Features
- Match Making between investors and founders
- Trends showing investment topics
- Feeds for updates
- Profile management
- Founder application with pitch deck upload

## Development
The development server is running at http://localhost:3000

## Project Structure
- Next.js 15 with App Router
- TypeScript for type safety
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Lucide React for icons
- Responsive design with dark mode support
